questions.text: what does the acronym MASH, which is the name of Ro's app, stand for?
questions.answer: It stands for mansion, apartment, shack and house.

questions.text: Ro's app, and the game it was based on, MASH, predicts what four things?
questions.answer: It predicts the city one will live in, their profession, how many children they will have and who their partner will be in the future.

questions.text: what does Ro ask the six teachers to do while giving her senior presentation?
questions.answer: She asks them to take out their phones and download MASH from the app store so she can show it to them.

questions.text: how does Vera help Ro with her MASH app?
questions.answer: Vera is a renowned human behavior expert and helps Ro develop the survey users will take to get their results in the MASH app.

questions.text: what is Ro's dad's dream?
questions.answer: He wants to own his own restaurant (so he can cook).

questions.text: what process does the partner match portion of the MASH app have to go through?
questions.answer: It requires more users who give their consent, then mines their data to unleash the algorithm to match them based on their surveys.

questions.text: which of the four pieces of information revealed in the MASH game/app did Ro believe was the best part?
questions.answer: Ro thinks figuring out who one marries is the best part of the app.

questions.text: who teaches Ro about the MASH game when she is a child?
questions.answer: Maren's mom taught Ro how to play MASH.

questions.text: why does Ro not want to go to college?
questions.answer: She thinks it is a waste of money because she is already doing what she wants to do (with creating the app and working in technology field).

questions.text: what work did Vera do before cancer slowed her down?
questions.answer: She ran a behavioral research lab at the university in Boulder.

questions.text: who promotes the MASH app for Ro?
questions.answer: Ro's cousin, Sawyer, an Instagram influencer, helps promote the MASH app.

questions.text: how many Instagram followers does Sawyer have?
questions.answer: Sawyer has nearly a million followers.

questions.text: who also promotes Ro's MASH app besides her cousin Sawyer?
questions.answer: Sawyer's most A-list friend, Josie Sweet (a singer), also promotes MASH.

questions.text: according to Ro, what do she and her mom have in common?
questions.answer: They both love technology and they look alike.

questions.text: how old is Ro when her mom left the family to move to California?

questions.answer: She sign the contract to partner with XLR8.

TWO PARTS: what is Miller's full name, and why does he go by Miller?
questions.answer: Miller's full name is Alistair Miller, the same as his Dad's, which is why he goes by Miller.

questions.text: how much older is Miller than Ro?
questions.answer: Miller is one month older than Ro.

questions.text: TWO PARTS: what is Miller's mom's name and how was she connected to Ro's mom?
questions.answer: His mom's name is Willow and she was Ro's mom's best friend who moved with her from Slate Lake together into an apartment in Switchback Ridge.

questions.text: how did Ro see herself compared to Miller?
questions.answer: She always felt he was better than her and the adults in their life gravitated to him.

questions.text: how did Ro feel different when she started high school, and why?
questions.answer: She said it was the first time she ever felt invisible in her life because she had gone to a tiny middle school where everyone knew one another and now she was in a school with 300 people just in the freshman class alone.

questions.text: what change had Ro noticed in Miller during middle school?
questions.answer: She says he folded himself into smaller and smaller version that became harder to see, which means he was becoming less social and more shy or self conscious.

questions.text: how does Ro and Miller's friendship fall apart?
questions.answer: Ro talks Miller into going to a party at senior Declan Frey's house and allows Declan and his friends to make fun of Miller admiring a mythology book, even joining in on making fun of him.

questions.text: what question did Miller ask Ro when he notices that Declan put his hands on her waist, and what is her response?
questions.answer: He asks Ro if she is ok and Ro tells him to chill and that she doesn't need him to protect her.

questions.text: what happened when Declan took Ro to his room?
questions.answer: He was touching her underwear and trying to unzip her skirt, but she said, "stop," and opened the door they were leaning against, causing her to fall into the hallway and make it possible to get away from him.

questions.text: what did Ro try to do the day after Declan's party, and what happened?
questions.answer: She tried to call Miller over and over again and he never answered.

questions.text: what are the specifics of XLR8's expectations for Ro and Miller's relationship?
questions.answer: Possible answers include unscripted public appearance like ice cream, hiking or museum visit once a week, or social media posts to @rodev twice a week, or social media posts to @MASHapp once a week, or TV, radio or print interviews as opportunities arise.

questions.text: what is Evelyn's counter offer to Miller's request for $47,000 for college?
questions.answer: She said they are willing to pay for all of his degree if they get the funding from Celeritas.

questions.text: why doesn't Ro's cousin Sawyer have a match on MASH right away?
questions.answer: It means no one with her parameters from her survey answers has joined MASH yet.

questions.text: TWO PARTS: name two of Miller's suggestions he makes for he and Ro to align their strategies for their very public match.
questions.answer: Possible answers include they walk to class together, or sit together at lunch on Fridays when he isn't tutoring, or drive her to school every day but Friday, or holding hands, or choosing different days of the week for their public appearances.

questions.text: what happens at the Gossamer Lake Dam when Miller is 11 and Ro is 10?
questions.answer: Ro was trying to ride her bike uphill and fell, sliding down toward the edge of the dam, with only her backpack strap stopping her from falling into dam.

questions.text: what type of injury did Ro suffer when she fell off bike near the dam?
questions.answer: She cut her arm open from lower bicep to her wrist.

questions.text: what happens when Ro and Miller appear on TV on Rocky Mountain Live show?
questions.answer: They essentially get in an argument on live TV.

questions.text: what is the name of the person XLR8 is using for input on the survey that Ro created with Vera?
questions.answer: Dr. Blaise Wisener is the new consultant for the survey questions (and additional categories in the app).

questions.text: what does Felix from XLR8 make Ro and Miller do as part of their first day of media training?
questions.answer: He makes them walk to a nearby park to practice being a couple (and to take pictures to post on social media).

questions.text: why doesn't Maren want to take the MASH survey?
questions.answer: She says she doesn't want to know her future.

questions.text: who is Maren dating and how do they meet?
questions.answer: Maren is dating Autumn and met her while hiking.

questions.text: what is one of the new categories XLR8 adds to Ro's MASH app?
questions.answer: Possible answers include species and breed of first pet, diseases one may be susceptible to as they age, the age one will retire and the number of grandchildren user will have someday.

questions.text: who does Sawyer finally match with on MASH?
questions.answer: She matches with a brawny tattoo artist from St. Paul.

questions.text: what does Ro end up doing by herself on Thanksgiving?
questions.answer: She ends up doing the hike she usually does with her Dad on Thanksgiving, (which is a six-mile loop into the spread meadow of an old mining town).

questions.text: where does Ro's winter formal take place?
questions.answer: It takes place at a restaurant called the Snowberry Room, which is right on the lake with floor to ceiling windows.

questions.text: why does Maren call the tuxedo Millers wears to the formal as his "Iliad tux"?
questions.answer: It is the same tuxedo he wore at his senior project presentation about the Iliad.

questions.text: what does Miller bring for Ro when he picks her up for the Winter Formal?
questions.answer: He brings her a corsage (with purple columbine she thinks Vera would love).

questions.text: TWO PARTS: what does Maren's girlfriend Autumn ask Ro and MIller at the Winter Formal, and what is their response?
questions.answer: She asks if their relationship is real because she hasn't seen them kiss. In response, Miller kisses Ro in front of Maren and Autumn.

questions.text: TWO PARTS: who calls Ro immediately after Miller kisses her at Winter Formal, and what did they say?
questions.answer: Her Dad calls her and asks her to come to the hospital (he indicates that Vera is close to death).

questions.text: what memory does Ro have when she enters the hospital to visit Vera the night of Winter Formal?
questions.answer: She has a memory of her and Miller at Vera's house coloring Easter eggs.

questions.text: what "gift" does Miller give Ro when he is at the hospital with her to see Vera?
questions.answer: Ro says Miller gives her the gift of truth, not telling her it's okay, but telling her she will get through it.

questions.text: what did Ro and her Dad do after Vera's funeral?
questions.answer: They drove to Rocky Mountain National Park, hiked 20 minutes to Alberta Falls, and then he gave her a letter from Vera that she is to read while there.

questions.text: what news does Sawyer share with Ro via text as she is standing in line at airport security on the way to New York?
questions.answer: Sawyer tells her that Hayes Hawkins broke up with Josie Sweet to be with the girl he matched with on MASH.

questions.text: TWO PARTS: on the plane ride to New York, Ro and MIller reveal the rest of their MASH results  to eachother. What are their three remaining results besides matching with eachother?
questions.answer: Ro's results are software developer, San Jose and no kids; Miller's results are professor, San Jose and two kids.

questions.text: what is Miller's response when Jimmy Fallon asks Miller if he and Ro are in love?
what does Ro realize about Miller on the plane home for New York, and what does she do?
questions.answer: She realizes that she loves Miller and she gets up, goes to wait for him just outside the lavatory, and then kisses him.

questions.text: what does the New York Times article criticize Ro about?
questions.answer: It claims MASH results are causing some young peope to feel hopeless since results don't match their dreams.

questions.text: who is unexpectedly sitting in the XLR8 conference room on the day Ro intends to tell them she wants to shut down the app?
questions.answer: To Ro's surprise, it is her mother.

questions.text: what is XLR8's plan to champion MASH after all the negative media coverage?
questions.answer: They intend to champion MASH success stories, showcasing all the people it has made happier.

questions.text: what is Ro's plan to take down XLR8?
questions.answer: She intends to "burn it down" by sharing stories of people who feel they have had their dreams stolen by MASH results so people will not want to use the app.

questions.text: when Maren finally takes the MASH survey, what are her results?
questions.answer: Maren said MASH tells her she will be an accountant and end up with a guy named Paul (she doesn't reveal the other two pieces of information).

questions.text: where do Ro and Miller go at 5 a.m. on their second trip to New York City?
who helps Miller and Ro change the video while they are appearing on the Today Show with Hoda Kotb to sabotage XLR8?
questions.answer: Felix agrees to help Ro and Miller take down XLR8.

questions.text: where does Ro's Dad finally get the money to open his restaurant?
questions.answer: He sold Vera's house, which he inherited upon her death, and used the money from sale to transform Beans on the Lake into the restaurant he always wanted.
